column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2018
column14: Absolutely LOVE this color. Funny that it's name is "love it" because that's literally what I said when I put it on. It's a perfect nude pink, where it's not completely obvious I'm wearing lipstick. Just makes my lips look and feel awesome. Price point is amazing as well,, will be stocking up.

column14: Love this raspberry color and it’s shininess.
